title: Portfolio v1.0
data: Currently I am involved in several projects through my internship at Day Fifty Five and working on expanding my portfolio. For the time being please feel free to look at the code powering this website. It utilizes Gatsby , React and , Three js. Stay tuned for more project updates...

title: VVouivre Vtuber Website
data: A small project done as a favor to a friend of mine. This project was programmed and designed by me and, uses scss , Barba and AnimeJs. It was designed to be easily scalable and easily readable.

title: Lickor-cat
data: A tiny react app that lets user's calculate how many calories of liquor they've consumed. I built this for fun over a weekend. It does lack some polish but its still a fun app.

title: Stylist Portfolio Site
data: A portfolio site for my friend who is a hairstylist. This app is a traditional Js/HTML site but uses a react component for the image gallery.

title: FullStack React Application Using google maps. 'Neon-street'
data: A fullstack application that lets users track 'races' using google maps. This application has its own backend and database both are used to keep track of a user's information as well as the 'races' they've completed. The backend was built using node and express
